pkmkdoc.description:
HTTP Ardour Video Server (harvid) and ffmpeg for use with Ardour3 video-timeline.
Note: this package will NOT interfere with existing ffmpeg installations.

choice.title: harvid-pkg
choice.description: Harvid + A3-ffmpeg HTTP Ardour Video server - prerequisite for the Ardour video timeline. Note: this installation does not interfere with existing ffmpeg/libav installations
